original_text: But he did things that the Lord said were evil. He did the same bad things that Nebat's son Jeroboam had done. Jeroboam had caused many people in Israel to do those sins, and Jehoahaz did not stop doing them himself. Kings 12 Kings 14
korean_text: 여호와 보시기에 악을 행하여 이스라엘에게 범죄하게 한 느밧의 아들 여로보암의 죄를 따라가고 거기서 떠나지 아니하였으므로

sentences.original_text: that the Lord said were evil
He did the same bad things
that Nebat's son Jeroboam had done
in Israel to do those sins
and Jehoahaz did not stop doing them
